name: hiccup
content:
hiccup noun
(NOISE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually plural ] a loud noise that you make in the throat without wanting to, caused by a sudden tightening of a muscle just below the chest and usually happening repeatedly the hiccups [ plural ]
a series of hiccups: have the hiccups I've got the hiccups.

hiccup noun
(PROBLEM)
